item.description:
OK, lets try this again?

This month's event will be held at India(for real this time)? Their brunch is $13.95 for an all you can eat buffet. Their menu and information can be found on their website here. I know Indian food is not everyone's "idea" of brunch, but I figured lets give it a try.

If this event fills up, please RSVP "No" with a comment requesting to be wait listed.

Everyone who has not attended previous events, please plan on bringing a dollar to help me defray the cost of posting on meetup. For everyone who has attended, I only ask that you contribute every other event. This would be such a big help to me!

I look forward to seeing you there! Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: See my piccy- I'm the one with the red hair ;-)
item.name: Rhode Island Brunch Bunch- India Restaurant
